channel.title: SalixLive Passwords :: Salix Documentation
channel.description: You can log in SalixLive as user one. The password is also one. User one can use the sudo command to execute commands as the superuser. The root user is disabled by default and therefore you canâ€™t log in as root. Salix 14.0 and earlier These are now old and unsupported releases of Salix, but just in case you happen to come across one, here is the relevant information: You log in as user one.
